channel.title: Chenopodium quinoa on funPlantGenes

item.title: TSARL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: AUR62017204 Gene Symbol: TSARL1 Gene Name: TSARL1 Genome: the quinoa reference genome V1 ) Species: Chenopodium quinoa Functional Descriptions: Site-directed genotype screening for elimination of antinutritional saponins in quinoa seeds identifies TSARL1 as a master controller of saponin biosynthesis selectively in seeds.
